title.rendered: Live Training for E-Commerce: Lead Generation and Transactional Emails Made Simple

content.rendered:
We’ve paired up with Miles DePaul from Mailjet for a free live training on lead generation and transactional email marketing. Mailjet is Europe’s leading email service provider sending over 1.5-billion emails every month. Sleeknote helps you engage visitors and capture leads with on-site messages. Together, we’re here to help you grow your contact list and engage them with beautiful, personalized content.

In This Webinar You Will Learn

Here’s a little summary of some of the subjects we cover in this webinar

  • A little-known way to help visitors make better (read: more expensive) purchasing decisions using page-specific popups
  • What to never do when using popups (if you get this wrong, Google will penalize your site
  • How one e-commerce site increased their opt-in rate by 216.7%
  • How transactional emails can drive 3x engagement
  • Brands that are getting transactional email right
  • How to incorporate transactional email into your strategy and tools
